item.title: Arknights: Endfield PC beta test set for mid-January 2025
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2024/12/arknights-endfield-pc-beta-test-set-for-mid-january-2025

  • PC

Registration now available.

Publisher GRYPHLINE and developer Mountain Contour will host a beta test for Arknights: Endfield for PC in mid-January 2052, the companies announced. Applications will be available via the official website starting today. The test itself will feature English, Japanese, Korean, and Mandarin voice-over and user interface options.

During the beta test, players will have the chance to explore the world of Talos-II as the Endministrator and experience exclusive content. Details will be made available via the official website. The end time for recruitment and start time for the test will be announced later.

Here are the system requirements for the beta test:

  • Platform: PC (Windows)
  • Type: Limited access, no payment, data wipe
  • System: Windows 10 / 11 64-bit
  • CPU:
    • Intel Core i7-10700K or equivalent, or better CPUs (Recommended)
    • Intel Core i5-9400F or equivalent, or better CPUs (Minimum)
  • GPU:
    • NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 or equivalent, or better GPUs (Recommended)
    • NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 6G or equivalent, or better GPUs (Minimum)
  • RAM:
    • 32GB (Recommended)
    • 16GB (Minimum)
  • Storage: 60GB free space or higher, SSD Recommended

Arknights: Endfield will be available for PlayStation 5, PC, iOS, and Android when it launches. A release date has yet to be announced.

Watch a new trailer below.
